Package de.maxhenkel.voicechat.api.packets

Interface StaticSoundPacket

All Superinterfaces:
ConvertablePacket, Packet, SoundPacket
public interface StaticSoundPacket extends SoundPacket
The receiver of this event will hear the sound non-directional. This is what is basically used for group chats.
